project_descr: The Programme aims to build capacities in the local government sector focussing on developing an internally coherent and consistent constitutional/legislative framework and setting up sound administrative, management and accountability systems.

outputs.output_descr: This Programme recognizes the critical role that local government plays both in terms of deepening democracy and enhancing people participation. It aims to build capacities in the local government sector for more efficient service delivery to the people.

document_name: Capacity Building for the Local GovSector and Service Dlivery Programme Document pdf
